modifier.replace-to: Enable local Actions only for this repository

Allow forking of private repositiories: Disabled

Allow members to invite outside collaborators: Disabled

Allow members to delete or transfer repositories: Disabled

category.name: Security Settings
category.desc: System settings that impact the security level of the service (e.g. Authentication).
